attributes.action: Protect Front Line staff - ISOLATE AND STOP THE SPREAD
attributes.additional_details: Frontline staff are being exposed to too much risk and being treated as expendable. We need to protect them if we want them to protect us.
attributes.background: Provide sufficient personal protection equipment to NHS and other front line staff in the fight against COVID-19. Implement stricter measures to stop the spread of coronavirus. Inform and educate public more rigorously on ways to contain the spread of the virus.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has closed all non essential shops, bars and restaurants and told everyone to stay at home. If you would like to see further measures, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310805

You may wish to sign this petition about PPE: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304243

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:  

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
